message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I'm looking to sell. I value it at no less than $100. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $150?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Hi Bob, after some consideration, I'm willing to lower my price. Would you be able to meet me in the middle at $135?
Hi Alice, thank you for lowering your price. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $132.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
